description: After more ways to use mango? Try this incredibly vibrant Thai-style beef and noodle salad featuring sweet mango and a soy, lime and chilli dressing.
keywords: Thai-Style Beef And Mango Noodle Salad
name: Thai-Style Beef And Mango Noodle Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place tomato, cucumber, shallots, mango, coriander leaves, beef and noodles in a large bowl and toss to combine. Serve immediately drizzled with remaining dressing.
